name: Performance Monitoring → Analytics → Report Generation → Client Delivery

parameters.query: SELECT c.content_id, c.title, c.published_at, c.content_type, c.target_keywords, cp.views, cp.clicks, cp.impressions, cp.avg_position, cp.ctr, s.facebook_shares, s.linkedin_shares, s.twitter_shares, s.total_engagement FROM content c LEFT JOIN content_performance cp ON c.content_id = cp.content_id LEFT JOIN social_metrics s ON c.content_id = s.content_id WHERE c.published_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days' AND c.status = 'published' ORDER BY cp.views DESC
SELECT client_id, client_name, content_quota, content_used, billing_status, contract_value, last_report_sent FROM clients WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY contract_value DESC

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.value: Generate comprehensive performance insights and recommendations based on this data: Sessions: {{ $json.overview.total_sessions }}, Users: {{ $json.overview.total_users }}, Conversions: {{ $json.overview.total_conversions }}, Avg Position: {{ $json.seo_performance.avg_position }}, CTR: {{ $json.seo_performance.avg_ctr }}%, Content Pieces: {{ $json.content_performance.total_content_pieces }}. Top content: {{ $json.content_performance.top_performers.slice(0,3).map(c => c.title).join(', ') }}. Create: 1) Executive summary with key wins and concerns 2) 5 strategic recommendations 3) Performance benchmarking vs industry standards 4) Next 30-day action plan. Focus on Australian market context and ROI optimization.

parameters.query: SELECT client_id, client_name, email, report_frequency FROM clients WHERE status = 'active' AND (last_report_sent IS NULL OR last_report_sent <= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days') ORDER BY contract_value DESC

parameters.subject: 📈 Your Content Performance Report - {{ new Date().toLocaleDateString('en-AU', { month: 'long', day: 'numeric' }) }}

parameters.query: UPDATE clients SET last_report_sent = NOW() WHERE client_id = $1

parameters.message:
📊 **Daily Performance Summary**

**Overall Performance:**
• Sessions: {{ $('Generate Professional HTML Report').item.json.summary.sessions.toLocaleString() }}
• Users: {{ $('Generate Professional HTML Report').item.json.summary.users.toLocaleString() }}
• Conversions: {{ $('Generate Professional HTML Report').item.json.summary.conversions }}

**Content Performance:**
• Active Content: {{ $('Generate Professional HTML Report').item.json.summary.top_content_count }} pieces
{{ $('Generate Professional HTML Report').item.json.summary.action_items_count > 0 ? `• Action Items: ${$('Generate Professional HTML Report').item.json.summary.action_items_count} optimization opportunities` : '• Status: All metrics healthy' }}

**Client Reports:**
• Reports Sent: {{ $('Fetch Clients Needing Reports').all().length }} clients updated

**Quick Actions:**
🔍 [View Dashboard](https://dashboard.theprofitplatform.com.au)
📈 [Full Analytics](https://dashboard.theprofitplatform.com.au/analytics)
📊 [Latest Report](https://dashboard.theprofitplatform.com.au/reports/latest)

*Generated automatically by Content Empire Analytics*
parameters.subject: 📊 Daily Performance Summary - {{ new Date().toLocaleDateString('en-AU') }}
